description: Welcome to The Boardwalk at Citadel Landing by Liberty Homes, Port Coquitlam's hidden gem of detached townhomes along the Fraser River. This beautifully updated 3 bed, 4 bath home offers over 2,200 sqft of bright living across 3 levels with air conditioning. Enjoy a updated kitchen, new flooring, plush carpets, and a spacious recreation room below. Separated Family room and Living room both with gas fireplaces. Relax in your private north-facing backyard or entertain on the sunny south-facing patio. Double garage plus large driveway. Steps to scenic riverfront trails, parks, and nature perfect for growing families. It's more than a house, it's your space, your family, your home. Welcome home. OPEN HOUSE: Sat (18th) 2-4pm.
